MAN.TITLE: getenv
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get the value of an environment variable

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : character string specifying environment variable name rep : an optional character string. When this optional value is used, the function getenv returns the value rep when the environment variable str is not found.
: character string which contain the environment variable value

DESCRIPTION.P: Return the value of an environment variable if it exists.
